title: .hack//Cell - Novel Updates
tags: Based on a Video Game   Gamers   MMORPG
author: Ryou Suzukaze
description:
.hack//CELL is a novel series written by Ryo Suzukaze, serialized in the magazine .hack//G.U.: The World, and published in paperback format.

It follows the experiences of a female Edge Punisher, Midori, as she hires herself out to players who want to fight her without resistance>
